thread.title: In Coal Industry’s Slump, Usual Buyers Go Underground
thread.title_full: In Coal Industry’s Slump, Usual Buyers Go Underground - WSJ

author: John W. Miller
title: In Coal Industry’s Slump, Usual Buyers Go Underground
text:
Tom Clarke received a cold reception when he first approached Patriot Coal Corp. earlier this year.
The company and its advisers were trying to sell some of its Appalachian mines after filing for bankruptcy protection. At first they doubted Mr. Clarke’s conservation group, whose mission is “to conserve Virginia’s natural resources to address climate change,” would have the money and know-how the deal required, according to people...
